titles.title: Native Chamorro Equity Act
Native Chamorro Equity Act
Native Chamorro Equity Act
To provide for contracting with Native Chamorro Organizations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
